title: 1695: How to Lose 100 Pounds
description:
In this episode Sal, Adam & Justin cover ten things a person should  do to successfully lose a lot of weight.

  • The psychological challenges of choosing to lose 100 pounds. (2:29)
  • The Biggest Loser distortion of reality. (5:20)
  • Ten Things a Person Should Do to Successfully Lose a lot of Weight.
  • #1 – Hire a therapist or enlist someone you trust & who loves you. (12:34)
  • #2 – Ditch the motivation hype and understand the importance of discipline & good habits. (17:20)
  • #3 – Focus on strength over the scale. (22:15)
  • #4 – Increase activity through daily habits. (25:52)
  • #5 – Eat your calories and NOT drink them. (30:07)
  • #6 – Avoid heavily processed foods. (33:02)
  • #7 – Create barriers between yourself and your impulses. (35:33)
  • #8 – Be mindful and slow down while eating. (39:54)
  • #9 – Prioritize protein. (43:51)
  • #10 – Hire a nutritionist. (46:17)

  • Visit ZBiotics for an exclusive offer for Mind Pump listeners!

  • What is NEAT and Why Should You Care About it? - Mind Pump Blog
  • Mind Pump #1037: How Ultra-Processed Foods Are Making You Fat, Sick, & Weak
  • Chewing Your Food: Is 32 Really the Magic Number?
  • Mind Pump #1690: Eight Holiday Hacks To Prevent Fat Gain
  • Why do we Need Protein? - Mind Pump Blog

  • Mind Pump Free Resources

People Mentioned

  • Paul Chek (@paul.chek)  Instagram
